abstract: The European Union’s top antitrust official said Wednesday she was ”still optimistic” that regulators could resolve a bitter dispute over an EU investigation into Oracle’s planned takeover of Sun Microsystems.
snippet: The European Union’s top antitrust official said Wednesday she was ”still optimistic” that regulators could resolve a bitter dispute over an EU investigation into Oracle’s planned takeover of Sun Microsystems.
lead_paragraph: The European Union‘s top antitrust official said Wednesday she was ”still optimistic” that regulators could resolve a dispute over Oracle‘s planned takeover of Sun Microsystems, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: European Regulator Optimistic About Oracle Resolution
